means: 泰山（美国影片人猿泰山的主人公）

sentence.Network_en: His daughter is named Jane, the same name as Tarzan's girlfriend.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的女儿叫简, 与Tarzan的女朋友的名字一样.

sentence.Network_en: She was plucked from the jaws of death by Tarzan.
sentence.Network_cn: 泰山把她从死亡边缘救了出来.

sentence.Network_en: Tantor : That sounded like Tarzan. It'sounded like he was in trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 丹托: 那听起来像是泰山. 好像他遇到麻烦了.

means.word_mean: 1. (sometimes used ironically) a man of great strength and agility (after the hero of a series of novels by Edgar Rice Burroughs)
2. a man raised by apes who was the hero of a series of novels by Edgar Rice Burroughs

auth_sentence.content: In the pool, Johnny Weissmuller, later to become Tarzan, won three golds in freestyle events and a bronze in the mens waterpolo.

auth_sentence.content: Johnny Weissmuller, who played Tarzan in Hollywood films, spent the last four years of his life here and is buried in Acapulco.
